SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.openxr

Class XrRect2Df

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.openxr.XrRect2Df
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class XrRect2Df extends Struct implements NativeResource
Rect in two dimensions.
Description

This structure is used for component values that may be fractional (floating-point).

See Also

XrExtent2Df, XrOffset2Df, GetSpaceBoundingBox2DFB

Layout


 struct XrRect2Df {
     XrOffset2Df offset();
     XrExtent2Df extent();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • XrRect2Df

      public XrRect2Df(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a XrRect2Df instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
